data.title: It's a bar.
data.text: Don't expect much... The food is great especially the burgers and tots.  Otherwise do not come here for a fine dining experience.

data.title: Super entertaining
data.text: This bar is tiny, but they have amazing food and drinks!! Karaoke is always a blast! The outdoor area in the summer is really nice too!!

data.title: Best burger
data.text: This place had the best burgers around! They take 20 minutes to cook because they do it slow to keep the juices in! You will not be disappointed!! Great popcorn and peanuts too!!!

owner_response.author: teamshortstop, Owner at Shortstop, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hi Tom, Thank you for your kind words and great review.  We hope to see you in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Burger and a beer
data.text: Nice place to stop for lunch. Great burgers for a good price, add a cold beer and you can even try your luck at pull tabs.

owner_response.author: teamshortstop, Owner at Shortstop, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thanks Doug for stopping by Shortstop Coon Rapids and trying out our place.  We really appreciate your business and feedback.  When in the area again, stop back.  Thank you!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love this.
data.text: Old hole in the wall bar. With meat raffles and bingo. The burgers are the star of the joint. You can watch them cook yours. Its right be hind the bar, wide open. I like to see my food get cooked. Great place to watch a baseball game ot football. The croud is into it.

owner_response.author: teamshortstop, Owner at Shortstop, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your great review.  Shortstop was established many years ago, and we haven't changed much about the structure.  Our kitchen is small, but our great staff can really pump out the food during a busy game day!  I'm so glad you enjoyed your visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great burgers
data.text: This is a dive bar with great burgers baskets & cold beer.. Local hangout. the do have a patio on the side with bean bag boards.

data.title: All you could want....
data.text: ... in a neighborhood bar. Burgers are excellent. Atmosphere is small town. Waitstaff couldn't be nicer. Owner is very involved in the neighborhood.

data.title: Excellent burgers
data.text: The burgers are some of the best in town, they use really good beef. It's a small place but it's a good spot to have some food and beverages.

data.title: dirty hole in the wall
data.text: Dirty restrooms, questionable food. seating is very limited. backs up to a neighborhood. it just has a bad reputation in cr.

data.title: Good Food, Cold Beer!
data.text:
This is one of the places my wife and me like to go to, 
Wednesday is Wings Wednesday.. .50cent wings, and you can get good pizza's cheap.
It's a sports bar, with plenty of seating and friendly servers.
It is one of those places that's fun to hang out with friends

data.title: busy , great staff and good food
data.text: they have popcorn, good food and happy hour.  staff is nice and so is the seating, the only draw back is it can get busy and seating might be limited

data.title: Neighborhood Bar
data.text: The locals know the history of this long standing neighborhood bar located in CR. Noted for after an after sports hangout and serving delicious hamburgers. The joint is always packed, and features nightly events - arrive early to get a table if you want to eat. Mostly a place for locals to drink, play pull-tabs and just hang out.
